text: Brad Cousino (born April 5, 1953) is a former American football linebacker. He played for the Cincinnati Bengals in 1975, the New York Giants in 1976 and for the Pittsburgh Steelers in 1977. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American football linebackers Category:Miami RedHawks football players Category:Cincinnati Bengals players Category:New York Giants players Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players
title: Brad Cousino
